titles: To His Excellency the Lord General Monck The unanimous representation of the apprentices and young men inhabiting in the City of London.
author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
notes: Dated at end: This was delivered to his Excellency at St. Albans, Thursday, Febr. 2. 1659. by persons elected for that purpose, and had a very cheerful reception.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
